data.message: He is a balless bitch who doesn't  want to stir up controversy , scared of pissing trump off!

replies.message: He dissed Trump
He made a whole rap about how crappy the government and trump are

That was also a freestyle. I'd like to see you.come up with 5 minutes of lyrics on the fly about any given content.
Annie Dunford really? The eminem show is what you think his best shit is? Slim Shady LP or Marshall Mathers LP are better for sure

Annie Dunford  you must've not listened to No favors by Big Sean and Eminem. He didn't have a lot to say. But he made sure his feelings about him were known.

Oh lord, let me get this out of the way first  . if it wasn't for us " old heads" Marshall Mather's wouldn't be shit because we are the ones who spent a lot of money on CD's concerts memorabilia. Us" old heads " excepted him in the rap game. Second ,you all must be trump supporters. Third , how many of you who don't support Trump think for one second trump would be in office if Marshall Mather's had something to say so, my comment had nothing to do with any of the comments yous are pulling out of your asses. No one gives two squirts or piss about Big Sean if they did he would be the rap god here. Forth, you don't know me to open your fucking mouth about what I feel about " Tupac Shakur" get his name straight obviously you don't have any respect for him. his word are far from weak. I know for fact Tupac would be all over trump to the point trump would never had a chance to get pass trump announcing he was running. DA DA DA DA   Americans lost the word retarted in their vocabulary years go asshole. My comment was on a political level . Your just an old ignorant ass bitch trying to start shit calling everyone some trump supporter, trump has nothing to do with this. calling eminem balless on his official page and acting like you're gonna get any support at all is fucking delusional.
